website_summaries.verdict: This versatile, chunky glitter  cosmetic glitter is perfect for adding glam to your face, hair, or body.
pros: Features a spectrum of crystallized rainbows, silver stars, full moons, speckles, hexagons, and dust
Can be used on the eyes and face
Colors can be mixed for endless possibilities
cons: You have to buy the body glue separately

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!! Put it on for EDC Las Vegas ❤️❤️❤️ A little goes a long way! I don’t know why people keep complaining that the jar is too small, I did half my face and hair, and I still have an almost FULL jar left. Not to mention the tremendous amount of glitter that I spilled on the bathroom floor trying to put it in my hair. I would def recommend, and that one jar is going to last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LemonBars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a concert and it was perfect! It is loose so you have to use primer for it to stick. I used e.l.f. Glitter primer and it stayed on all night.
customer_reviews.author: ~m~

customer_reviews.title: This glitter ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is EVERYTHING!!! You really can't go wrong with it. It was easy to apply using E.l.f. glitter glue, and was long lasting till I washed it off. It comes off easily when removing it, which is a BIG plus. Definitely will be purchasing more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute add on to my friends alien outfit. Used hairspray to make I‎t stick. Don’t buy glue it’s a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought they just sent me silver glitter ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they just sent me silver glitter, but lo and behold, I opened to find all the shapes I wanted. Very small and very messy, but that is what glitter is all about eh?
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Gring

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: WORTH THE MONEY. You may think it is a little on the pricey side for glitter and that you can find cheaper else where but you totally get what you pay for. This is an investment! I have used it for multiple festivals now and shared it amongst my girlfriends and have barely even made a dent in it. Not to mention, this is some beautiful glitter. I personally wasn't able to find anything like it in stores and im glad I just gave in and purchased it. I applied it with hair gel and it stayed on great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit smaller than I expected, but once I actually saw the container for the sparkles I realized I didn’t need anymore than what came with the package. The sparkles are very pretty and in cute shapes. I used this glitter for a New Years music festival and it was perfect, I only used my fingers to apply it to my face after my makeup and it stayed on very well, I haven’t tried it with any other base. Be careful when you open the container, they really pack the glitter in there, it explodes everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This Glitter is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to apply this glitter with just a little bit of hairspray and it stuck perfectly! The glitter itself has the best shine and appears holographic every time you move. The glitter stuck to me for most of the night and only small amounts came off, which I think is better than most. A little bit goes a long way too so the container should last a really long time! Overall for the price and the product you get I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Bangz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I do a lot of mystical artwork and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I do a lot of mystical artwork and adding the odd holographic star or hexagon shape just adds that beautiful sparkle. I would order these again. Very small pack so if you want to throw glitter on in BULK this is not the product for you. I place these holographic pieces carefully as if they are made of gold! And they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Missing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was soo excited to get this for my Halloween costume! The bubble wrapped envelope was light but I thought it was OK since it's a compact of glitter. NOPE! It was empty, and empty envelope!!! I don't even know how to do a return on something I NEVER GOT!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole =^.^=

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is the best glitter, just use hair gel on the areas ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a really small round container for $10 I expected a lot more glitter so they lose a couple stars for that. Otherwise it is the best glitter, just use hair gel on the areas you want it to stick and you're good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this glitter. Consistently call it the good glitter for a reason. It sticks to my body very easily with a little bit of moisture (sweat, lotion, etc). Karizma is doing it right. It's a small tube of glitter, but it is worth every penny, as a little bit goes a long way. Love the different color options, and the differing sizes of glitter specks.
customer_reviews.author: denas

customer_reviews.title: The best glitter I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glitter at least a year ago and it is still over half way full. I was a bit skeptical on the price, but I wanted something that would work so i gave it a try. let me tell you... I have used this for multiple music festivals, Halloween parties, and honestly just on a Saturday night if i was feeling myself! I always get compliments on this glitter! I applied with a body glitter glue which you can get for pretty cheap and these guys stay on until you shower!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Gales

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love glitter?
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest glitter ever! I should have purchased the NYX glue that is suggested, I thought I could just apply to my face using a little hair spray, which worked fine for a few hours but after a few hours at the festival and a lot of sweating the glitter mostly all fell off. The glitter was super cute though, some smaller pieces and a few large chunks mixed together! Glad I got a few pictures in before the night got started. The container it comes in looks a little small but there is soooooo much product so don’t worry!
customer_reviews.author: Duyen Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Best Glitter EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST CHUNKY GLITTER EVER!! I use this for festival / adult dress-up and it is AMAZING ! As long as you use some kind of glitter adhesive, it will stay on for hours. If you don't, it falls off within minutes getting on everyone near you. It is dynamic, bold and just gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: RBL FSH

customer_reviews.title: Loose Glitter
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I int read the description well but this is just loose glitter. The large pieces are beautiful and holographic but I had to buy another fine gel glitter to mix with this to get it to stay on. The picture is a little deceiving as I thought I would be able to apply it to my body right out of the jar.
customer_reviews.author: KGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Chunky glitter heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my neice's mermaid themed birthday party and they were such a hit! The colors are beautifully vibrant and reflective and look identical to the photos! We bought a glitter makeup glue so that they stayed adhered for hours on end and they did! Highly impressed and will be buying more. This glitter is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Ehimmelman

customer_reviews.title: Glitterific!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty. Container appears small but there is a lot of glitter. Large pieces. Open this container over a small zip loc bag to avoid a big mess. Used peel off glitter adhesive on my face to press chunky glitter onto. Stayed on for hours and didn't flake or rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Chunky Glitter Tears 😍
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is perfect! I was looking for a chunky glitter to make tears with for a concert! I just got the cheapest glitter primer from Amazon and used an old eyeshadow brush to apply it. There is soooo much! I didn't make a dent in it with these tears and I did 3 layers! Btw I did not need 3 layers. The first layer was great, the second layer filled in the gaps. I decided to change the shape a bit, hence the third layer. I love the shapes! I cannot to use it again. I am so happy with this product!! Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Cagnolatti

customer_reviews.title: All that glitters... !!!
customer_reviews.text: •I used the glitter to compliment an outfit I wore to a festival. •It is decently priced , but could be cheaper •Comes in a small container , but definitely worth it •Gets a little messy, but what else do you expect from glitter? •Must use primer for adhesion . Not necessarily glitter adhesive, but something it’ll stick to. •It is beautiful once on I would definitely buy again .
customer_reviews.author: LWH

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I wanted, but still okay.
customer_reviews.text: This is very chunky glitter, I was hoping it would be a little more fine but it is as described so I won't fault it for that. It's hard to know what a product will be like before it gets to you, but the big pieces in the glitter are almost the thickness of a pencil, which is thicker than I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Glitter perfection
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a zombie mermaid look. I loved the way it turned out. I used put Vaseline where I wanted the glitter to stick. Then sprinkled the glitter on. It worked like a charm. Was on all night even after sweating a bit. Was super easy to wash off. I went to EDC two weeks later and decided to use it again. A lot of product for not a lot of dollars. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Martin

customer_reviews.title: Loose glitter, need a glue
customer_reviews.text: It is a loose glitter. You will need glitter body glue to apply it. I like the NYX brand. Used them to put stars on our face with makeup for a "space babes" look for a space party in LA. Got lots of compliments. Good glitter in various sizes. Small jar with twist off lid, but it is very very full. If you were going to cover large sections of your body, you'd need more than 1 jar.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my alien Halloween costume and I love it. There are little stars in there that make it perfect for my needs. It did not come with glue so I purchased NYX glue. The hold was pretty good. I'm excited to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha R.

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looked awesome and stayed on for Halloween but I bought a glitter primer from Nyx and applied that to my skin first then put this glitter then put a little of the primer on top of that and it stayed all night. Even with people touching, bumping against where I had it on my arms and face
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Super retty glitter and amazing quality/ amount!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glitter, I used it at a festival and it stayed all day and night both days and I sweat A LOT. And for the amount I used (for makeup and all over my body for both days) I didn’t even put a dent in the container. There’s enough for me to use it for a long long time. Definitely worth it and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Chunky glitter, will make you sparkle.
customer_reviews.text: Its glitter and you need glitter glue to adhere. IT WILL MAKE YOU LOOK LIKE A SPARKLING GODDESS THO. HARAMBE CAN SEE YOU FROM HEAVEN. The packaging is small but dont let it fool you. The glitter is light, and lasted through 12 hours of sweat and dancing, parobably in part to the glue. Its chunky and reflectove, so if youre looking for smaller particles...this also them. Its not a fine powder. They are small pieces of joy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Alba

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Bought it for fun festival wear along ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it for fun festival wear along with ELF glitter primer. Easy to apply and stayed on very well!
customer_reviews.author: nicedream

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought this for EDC next weekend(music festival) with the intention of being able to use it on my face/body. The picture of the girl displaying the product on her arm makes me think that it's was ready to use, sort of a glitter paste and it's not. It's just loose glitter. I didn't expect that when I opened it. If you're looking for ready to use glitter I recommend Urban decay's heavy metal instead.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Romero

customer_reviews.title: As expected, it got everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, with glitter, it's going to get places. I like that there is a variety of sizes of the glitter pieces. I think that maybe a little well of petroleum jelly or other product should be included with this to get it to stick. I did read the reviews and understood that I would have to use Vaseline or something to keep it on, but for review purposes, this might be a drawback for some. Looked amazing on!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product that I applied near my eyes and on ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is very small, and overflowed with glitter so make sure you open the glitter over something that isn't the floor. This glitter is exactly what I was looking for. Overall a great product that I applied near my eyes and on my chest for halloween. I applied with eyelash glue the first night, and hair spray the second night and both worked perfectly! Didn't have any problems with the glitter falling off and I really liked the way it turned out
customer_reviews.author: emxoxo123

customer_reviews.title: SPILLED MY LOVELY CHUNKY GLITTER DAILY REMINDERS ON MY RUG
customer_reviews.text: I love this glitter and will need to buy it again after only using it once I left it open and it spilled all over my face paint kit Wow I was cleaning it up and I could not stop saying OMG this is so beautiful the colors the shapes super cool how sad :( I wanted to kick my self but I was to tired after cleaning it up LOL
customer_reviews.author: Susan  D

customer_reviews.title: Glitter up!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Carnival. It was amazing. If you moisturize your body with some type of oil it definitely adheres better. I was rushing. It was the last thing that I added, so I basically just tossed it everywhere on me lol Turned out great to me 😌
customer_reviews.author: Kyneetah

customer_reviews.title: The glitter is beautiful and can be used in a million ways
customer_reviews.text: The glitter is beautiful and can be used in a million ways. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because the container is actually so small. Granted it is a fair amount of glitter, but I wouldn't have spent $8.00 for such a little amount (though it is my fault for not checking the product demensins before buying).
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Was a bit skeptical because the product comes in such a small container, but do not be fooled. There is plenty in the container! Would buy again. Plenty of compliments when I use it! I fee like a fairy princess when I use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia

customer_reviews.title: Love this glitter so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this glitter so much, I have already used it twice. I got a lot of compliments and the glitter didn't budge all night.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ferriss

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I literally LOVED this glitter. I was worried that I wouldn't have enough based off other reviews but I had PLENTY. Me and three other girls used the 1 container I bought for our face, arms and chest. I still have more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super pretty 🤩
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS GLITTER I AM OBSESSED. i used vaseline to make it stick. stayed on all night 😍 and you get a lot in the container even though it might not look like it. a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but i love it its gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: doesnt come with very much, and when i opened the container it spilled everywhere- i have no idea how they got it that full in the first place. but i love it its gorgeous glitter
customer_reviews.author: Flora

customer_reviews.title: do not use
customer_reviews.text: I wore this glitter along with my labor costume. it was flawless an did not come off till I showered. the next day however, I broke out into hives! not only that I now have circle tan marks in one area of my arm, which is weird. its been almost a week an I still have hives an my skin is a mess. I wouldn't use this product if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: SaySay

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE and very little amount!  Go to a craft store instead
customer_reviews.text: The glitter was nothing different than what I could pick up at a craft store. In comparison, this was a tiny amount of glitter for $7+. I went to a local craft store and bought the smallest bottles of fine glitter, medium glitter, and jumbo glitter and created my own. I had a 16oz bottle of glitter versus the pinch of expensive glitter bought here.
customer_reviews.author: Gravelhighway

customer_reviews.title: Show stopper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glitter for a party and loved it. I used the NYX glitter primer to stick the loose glitter and it was easy to apply, did not irritate my skin and stayed on for hours. The quantity is excellent for the price and I still have some leftover. The removal process is simple and the glitter comes off very easily. I definitely recommend this product! If I could wear glitter on this level everyday I would!
customer_reviews.author: Melissak

customer_reviews.title: Super great
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is bomb. The tub is small but seems bottomless...so much so I accidentally put my hand in it (after I was finished applying), dumped a ton out, and still have a lot left over. It was easy to remove and easy to apply. I used it with NYX glitter glue.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: I <3 GLITTER!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for raves, I love the chunky glitter. The only thing you should be aware of is that these don't come with any glue. You need to find your own adhesive, they won't just stay on like the model shown.
customer_reviews.author: julianna braley

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and variety of shapes
customer_reviews.text: I use a little spirit gum and it stays all day, even in 100 degree Vegas weather. Be careful opening as they give you a lot of product and it can spill. But still, I would rather have a lot of glitter than not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Great high impact glitter
customer_reviews.text: Great on skin and hair, use hair spray on top to hold it longer. I used this at a festival, everyone was asking me for some! I made some friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen the Critic

customer_reviews.title: NOT Biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT biodegradable. The box clearly says it’s micro plastic, no thank you. M.O.O.P. City! I returned it and bought biodegradable glitter instead.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: The initial picture makes it look like it can be spread on. It is just loose glitter. I had to mix it with aloe gel to.get it to stick
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Look great and really blink. Can’t last a day. Adhesive not gonna last long. It’s kinda suck when they fell on the floor and u have to clean it up after.
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty I bought this along with Graftobian's liquid mixing base ...
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty I bought this along with Graftobian's liquid mixing base for sparkles (also found on Amazon) and they work really well together
customer_reviews.author: jackie morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful!!!!!!!!!! A lot in a very small container. Be careful right when you open it to avoid a glitter bomb. Open it in a bag so you don’t waste any.
customer_reviews.author: Arm

customer_reviews.title: I love this glitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this glitter! Only reason for 4 stars is because I got a slight irritation but I'm not sure if it was from the facial glue or the actual glitter. So shiney and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty glitter
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for my party. We used petroleum/Vaseline and a make up brush to apply. Make side to have something to apply it with. Looked really great on and everyone was asking for some!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Moody

customer_reviews.title: Chunky cute & adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a festival and it stayed on my face all night! You get a little container but I only used a minuscule amount so it will definitely be lasting me a couple years which is a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Got everywhere
customer_reviews.text: There is no adhesive! It's just glitter! You probably will need to buy some body glue or something. It's very pretty tho. Package smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.author: amarah stilianos

customer_reviews.title: I love this glitter!
customer_reviews.text: This glitter is bright and shiny. It is a bit smaller than I imagined but there is plenty in the pack for multiple applications. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marni Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: This little amount goes far, really far. We had so much fun playing with this for halloween. And there is still so much more to play with for upcoming events or festivals.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, chunky pieces do not adhere well
customer_reviews.text: I really love the colors. The finer glitter adheres well with adhesive but chunky pieces not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool body glitter
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool body glitter. I had a hard time getting it to stay but that could have been my fault . It was a fun add on to my space outfit .
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect festival glitter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect festival glitter. I paired this with the face glitter glue it recommended me & it lasted all day and night. I used an eye shadow brush to apply the glitter to my face. Didn’t flake and look greats!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Calametti

customer_reviews.title: So glittery
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this glitter. It's easy to work with and a little goes a long way. Ill be getting multiple uses out of a single jar.
customer_reviews.author: Ay

customer_reviews.title: Love this chunky glitter so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this chunky glitter so much! Used for hair and body. Beautiful and easy to remove. Definitely will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Green

customer_reviews.title: It’s great! Just wish it came in a different container
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! Just wish it came in a different container. The container is so small and there is so much glitter in it that everytime you open it the glitter falls out. I had to put mine in a bigger container.
customer_reviews.author: shawn Robertson

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY ON
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT STICK. ugh and they overfilled the container so when I opened it glitter when ALLOVER my luggage. Wouldn’t recommend to wear, maybe good for crafts.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: BYO Glue
customer_reviews.text: The glitter in itself is really pretty, but be warned that there is no adhesive as seemingly advertised. Purchased for a Halloween costume and not only was the glitter not sticky, but incredibly messy upon opening the container. Feel that the advertisement was slightly misleading and just know that you will need to purchase glue.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This did not come in a gel like I thought. It was loose glitter.... I ended up not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle Queen
customer_reviews.text: I love this chunky glitter so much!! A little goes a lonngggg ways which is always nice. I've used it probably 10+ times and still have heaps left. I love how shimmery it is and all the cute little shapes <3
customer_reviews.author: squiddakyd

customer_reviews.title: I love the way the glitter falls on your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the glitter falls on your skin. it looks amazing in phots and easily washes off. Very comparable to the UK brands. There is so much of the glitter compacted in the container, it will fluff up!!!!! I know one will last years!
customer_reviews.author: jordannnceee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: FYI. Really small tube but remember a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this purchase! I received so many compliments about my look. Make sure you buy a glitter primer to hold the glitter. I loved the different size and shapes within the container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A teenage girl's dream
customer_reviews.text: If your young girl needs to stand out, this is the perfect product. She will definitely be glitzy.
customer_reviews.author: KLMN

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Totally Awesome 😎 Adults and Children love this product . It’s everything . You must use a gel to bind it together.
customer_reviews.author: Annie The Kinderklown

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: There is A LOT of glitter packed in this small container. Very pretty & holographic. I used hair gel to apply & it worked perfect & stayed out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dmngz

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: I only give the adhesion 1 star because it doesn’t come with the adhesion. But otherwise once you get that it’s a great product and last long!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Gets everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Love how chunky the glitter is. Sadly it does not come with its own body glue but I just used some moisturizer and it stuck to me for the whole night. The container comes wayyyyyy too overpacked so when I opened it glitter went everywhere. There is still glitter in the crevasses of my room but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Hornbarger

customer_reviews.title: Love this glitter!
customer_reviews.text: Love this glitter! Such good quality and perfect for my halloween costume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stuff for Disco!
customer_reviews.text: I used lash adhesive glue as this does not come with any kind of adhesive. Works great and will last a lifetime! Very pretty on the cheeks!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter and it would not stick at all! Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fain

customer_reviews.title: Goes far!
customer_reviews.text: Def worth the money. This glitter goes far!! My wife did a whole arm and her face and still had more then half left over.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK SIMMONS

customer_reviews.title: just glitter
customer_reviews.text: nothing fancy the pics of the artwork reeled me in i was definitely a sucker for it
customer_reviews.author: tahitia

customer_reviews.title: STRIKING GLITTER
customer_reviews.text: I’m OBSESSED with this glitter!!! It is so striking and looks good with so many different costumes! I just tap on some Elmer’s glue to where I want it to stick and then immediately tap on the glitter before it dries and it stays on SO WELL!!! Like, I am amazed. Seriously, just get it. You won’t regret it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Time for Utopia

customer_reviews.title: Chunky glitter
customer_reviews.text: Love this decal mixture very shiny, just what I was looking for.. great with gel nails.
customer_reviews.author: SilverLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I used aloe vera gel (like some of the reviews suggested) to make the glitter stick to my body. I got a lot of compliments. Bit of a warning: the party I went to was about a month ago and I'm still cleaning up glitter everywhere in my flat. But that of course comes with the territory when buying glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: This came in like 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This came in like 2 days. I was worried that the glitter may be to large, but its perfect size for accenting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It is as described and pictured. Use make up glitter glue to stick it to you
customer_reviews.author: IG xsixela

customer_reviews.title: Great (But Messy) Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this for numerous concerts with elf cosmetic glue. It looks amazing and I have always gotten compliments!! My only complaint is that the packaging does not come with an applicator, and using your bare hands gets extremely. Would definitely invest in an applicator if you’re purchasing this. Other than that, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pena

customer_reviews.title: I feel like lady gaga!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like lady gaga! This glitter is absolutely awesome! I bought an adhesive to go along with it cuz its just loose glitter. But it's beautiful! !!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super cute and works very well! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. I bought this for a music festival
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I bought this for a music festival. I stuck it on with hair spray and it lasted all day and all night. I was so impressed that it stayed on in the 90 degree heat (I was so sweaty), and non stop dancing. Its a small container but it goes a long way. I have so much left for the next time I need glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hager

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on! I used Vaseline so it would be easy to get off when i wanted to take it off. Loved the colors and the look.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: this silver is my favorite from the collection - shines bright in the dullest ...
customer_reviews.text: this silver is my favorite from the collection - shines bright in the dullest light and looks great on all skin tones
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product, however, I did not realize that it was just the loose glitter without any gel to adhere it to the skin. Make sure that, when you order this, you also order some glitter glue.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Marie Cygnar

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could wear everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: Looked so awesome! I used the glitter for a music festival in Florida and I got lots of compliments. I used it to totally cover my back to go with an open back shirt and I felt fabulous! I used it on my chest and face other days. I applied it with hair gel and it stayed all day.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Easy chunky glitter that was perfect for my halloween costume! Sticks pretty well on its own, but even better with a glitter primer for lasting wear! Be careful with the cap, I accidentally got a lot of glitter on the floor trying to get the cap back on but that’s always a risk with glitter!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Lots of quality glitter - not enough container space
customer_reviews.text: I might have lost the glue or couldn’t find it but ended up mixing the glitter with aloe for apply and it worked well! There was a lot of glitter for such a little package which is nice you’re getting a decent amount of it but I can’t close the lid back very well and I use a decent amount.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Shriver

customer_reviews.title: Super shiny
customer_reviews.text: The jar was small but for real there is so much product there, a little goes a long way. It was easy to adhere, I used nyx glitter primer and it stayed on great and was comfortable. Washed off easy too. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: lady_gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great body glitter
customer_reviews.text: This glitter worked perfectly for a costume. Very pretty and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl Bayona

customer_reviews.title: Lose glitter to make you shimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great glitter. I did not realize I was purchsing loose glitter however it worked out well with eye lash glue or aloe Vera gel!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to costume
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a costume: very vibrant different sizes and stayed on all night with hairspray
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glitter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter’s unicorn inspired birthday. I used eyelash adhesive glue to apply this to her face. The glitter is amazing. You get so much in the little jar. Can’t wait to try in the hair!
customer_reviews.author: Thea's mommy

product_meta.title: Silver Holographic Chunky Glitter ✮ KARIZMA BEAUTY ✮ 10g Festival Glitter Cosmetic Face Body Hair Nails
feature_bullets: ✮ KARIZMA GLITTER: Sparkle season is here. Take it to the next level with our Silver Holographic chunky glitter featuring little stars, dust and hexagons for an irresistible glow. Our cosmetic glitters are made with designer formulas, high intensity pigment and holographic shine. The chunky glitter collection features 10g of Karizma glitter, perfect for gifts and your glitter addiction.

✮ OUR BRAND: We started our brand by working closely with celebrities and the music industry on their style. Our glitter was inspired by working behind the scenes on music videos, backstage preparing for tours and festival stage performances. We have designed our own glitters for you bringing some sparkle from our world. The KARIZMA glitter is your secret formula to get that superstar glow and be sure to get a lot of compliments.

✮ VEGAN, COSMETIC GRADE, CRUELTY FREE & KID FRIENDLY: Tested on celebrities, not animals. Karizma glitters are vegan, cruelty free, non toxic and cosmetic grade. The packaging is recyclable. Our cosmetic grade glitter are very safe to wear on the skin and are also kids friendly. Please be careful with using glitter on the face as often people buy craft glitter which is made with pieces of glass. Karizma glitter is safe to wear on the skin and will compliment all skin tones.

✮ STYLE TIPS FROM KARIZMA: Drip in glitter glow at festivals with under the eye glam glitter tears or on the cheekbones for a club night ready reflecting highlight. Our hair glitter makes for the cutest glitter braid insta looks. On the body, dust some on the collarbones and shoulders for a super shimmering effect, perfect for weddings and evening glamour. Mix our colours for unlimited makeup moments with your friends. Tag us on Instagram at karizmabeauty, we can't wait to see what you create.

✮ THE KARIZMA PROMISE: Take the Karizma glitter home and love its beautifully formulated blend. We know you are a VIP client and will only provide you with the finest product and service or we’ll refund your event cent. Add your glitter to your cart and experience the Karizma Beauty pop culture experience phenomenon.
